Ephraim \add was\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God: \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fowler|strong="H3352"\w*’s \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \add and\add* enmity \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w deeply|strong="H6009"\w* \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5771"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H2142"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H2142"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

As \w for|strong="H3205"\w* Ephraim, their \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* \w away|strong="H5774"\w* \w like|strong="H5774"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w*: there \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w be|strong="H3519"\w* no \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H5775"\w* none with \w child|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H5775"\w* no \w conception|strong="H2032"\w*.

Ephraim, \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasant \w place|strong="H5116"\w*: \w but|strong="H7200"\w* Ephraim \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w slayer|strong="H2026"\w*.

Ephraim \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*, \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: \w yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beloved|strong="H4261"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* womb.
